texts.name: Grok
texts.biography: Grok's promotion as the Sovereign's "go-fer" was due to two things: his innate indefatigability and the Sovereign's love for massacre. He is his master's bloody entertainments manager, driving all manner of game and beings before Kha-Beleth to be slaughtered. The Sovereign knows that if there is a matter that must be handled quickly, there is no better fiend for it than the slavishly obedient and mindlessly brutal Grok.

specialty.description: Gates a stack of Imps, Gogs, and Hell Hounds at the start of battle.
